item.title: Countries that I would like to move to
item.description: The Netherlands Bike Education Non car-centric Japan Anime Non car-centric New Zealand 90% of electricity produced are renewable Beautiful country France Nuclear power French sounds nice Germany German sounds cool Beatiful cities Good food Kinda car-centric, but not much.

item.title: I don't regret anything and you shouldn't too
item.description: Have you ever wished to go back in time to fix something I’m sure most people probably had at some point in their life.

item.title: I don't regret anything and you shouldn't too
item.description: Urban design Design cities that is built for cars Walkable cities Rapid transit Trains Nuclear power We transitionning ourselves fast enough Used in places where geography is a problem Short term solution for renewable energy in the future Meat ( quite hard) Cows Plant based ( eh )
